channel.title: [508/525] Xfer help
channel.description: Ok, I finally got trading to work on Codeusa source, now how do I stop players from xferring starters. I would like to know how to make 1 char online per ip at a time but making it so they can't trade within 1 hour of joining would would also. Can anyone help me?
